full_summary:
================

### Invitation for Tender (RFP)

#### Project Title and Description
**Roof Replacement and Generator Installation for the PCSP of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to undertake roof replacement and generator installation services for the Polar Continental Shelf Project (PCSP) of NRCan in Resolute Bay.

#### Key Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4328454065
* **Publication Date**: December 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 29, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 18, 2025

#### Contract Requirements

This RFP is open to all qualified contractors who meet the requirements outlined in the notice. Bidders are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the specific requirements and conditions outlined in the RFP.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The bidding procedure is based on a competitive process, and the selection criteria include the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Proposals will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the RFP, among other factors.

#### Contact Information

To obtain a copy of the RFP, please visit [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18209587?extsite=MTgyMDk1ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Proposed Work

The successful contractor will be responsible for the design, implementation, testing, and commissioning of new roofs and generators for the NRCan facility in Resolute Bay. This will include all necessary labour, materials, equipment, and documentation required to complete the project to the satisfaction of the Client.

### Expression of Interest
Eligible contractors must express their interest in completing this project by submitting a proposal to the PWGSC on or before the tender closing date. The successful bidder will be notified and will be expected to provide all necessary documentation and information as part of the RFP process.

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
This RFP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to domestic bidders only. The region of opportunity for this project is Resolute Bay. Please note that the limited tendering reason is `None`. 

**Please note**: The Contracting Entity Address is 11 Laurier St, Gatine
